Constructor Detail

PomRule

public PomRule(java.io.File ivyFile,
               java.io.File pomFile,
               ResolveRule resolveRule,
               ResolveRule testResolveRule)
Normally PomRule objects are not created directly but, through calling IvyAddon.createPomRule(String, ResolveRule)

Parameters:
ivyFile - Ivy file to read from
pomFile - Target pom file to create
resolveRule - Resolve rule to use
testResolveRule - Test resolve rule to use
Method Detail

setPomCallback

public PomRule setPomCallback(java.lang.Object callback)
This lets you set a custom callback that can manipulate the pom as a DOM object before the pom file is rendered. The object that is passed to the callback is a org.w3c.dom.Document which is the pom.

Parameters:
callback - This can be either the string name of a method, an instance off BuildCallback, a closure (groovy) or a function (js).
Returns:
